name: Assisted Senior Living
tag_list: assisted-living, hospice, nursing-homes-retirement-homes, in-home-senior-care, independent-living, senior-care, alzheimers-care
overview:
Assisted Senior Living provides one of the most comprehensive and unbiased directories of senior care options.

The site includes contact information, maps details and reviews of over 100,000 senior care options including:

  • Assisted Living (Adult Foster Care)
  • Nursing Homes
  • Alzheimer’s and Dementia Care Centers
  • Independent Living
  • Adult Day Care
  • In-Home Care
  • Hospice Care
  • Continuing Care Retirement Communities (CCRC)

Assisted Senior Living includes special tools for caregivers like the option to build and print a list of potential care options. The site was created for caregivers by caregivers.
